content: As an AI language model, I do not know which city you are referring to. However, in general, visitors can expect to see a variety of art and heritage in outdoor public spaces, such as sculptures, murals, mosaics, fountains, and monuments. The artworks may range from contemporary to historical, cultural to abstract, and can represent the city's identity, history, and natural surroundings. In addition, visitors may also witness traditional shows and performances or events that showcase the city's cultural heritage.
